title: No loot boxes
body: Hi I am honor level 2 and I have not gotten any loot in over 20 plus games. I really don't understand I hope a mod will help me out. I have gotten a few S ranks and i really don't think this is normal!

replies.body: Remember that you can only get one chest per champion per season from S- or above, and you need to own that champion as well. If you're referring to Honor Capsules, those don't start dropping until level 3.
